text: 1. There is no better lunch that cherry tomato caprese. I can’t get enough. Marinating the tomatoes is everything. 2. Sourdough blondies! My mind is blow. Must make. 3. Foods to never bring to a cookout. 4. Motivation to declutter! Since back-to-school is basically my new year, I’m all for it. 5. Speaking of, we got school supplies yesterday and it’s still my favorite thing on the planet. 6. Must try condensed milk cold foam. Whoa. 7. TV things!! I started the new Dexter, The Hunting Wives and finally got to watch The Summer I Turned Pretty! 8. Pretty sure I could be into an UNO social club!
html:
1. There is no better lunch that cherry tomato caprese. I can’t get enough. Marinating the tomatoes is everything.

2. Sourdough blondies! My mind is blow. Must make.

3. Foods to never bring to a cookout.

4. Motivation to declutter! Since back-to-school is basically my new year, I’m all for it.

5. Speaking of, we got school supplies yesterday and it’s still my favorite thing on the planet.

6. Must try condensed milk cold foam. Whoa.

7. TV things!! I started the new Dexter, The Hunting Wives and finally got to watch The Summer I Turned Pretty!

8. Pretty sure I could be into an UNO social club!
